alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stratmoor, or near Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Security, Security-Widefield, Peterson Space Force Base and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
